recipes.name: Belt Enchant: Personal Space Amplifier
recipes.description:
Permanently attaches a specialized device to your belt, allowing you to knockback your current target.  Shares a cooldown with potions.

Only the engineer's belt can be modified, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

recipes.name: Belt Enchant: Holographic Horror Projector
recipes.description:
Permanently attaches a specialized device to your belt, allowing you to fear an enemy within melee range for 5 sec.

Only the engineer's belt can be modified, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

recipes.name: Belt Enchant: Miniaturized Plasma Shield
recipes.description:
Permanently attaches a specialized device to your belt, which when used creates an absorb shield around the player for 10 sec.

Only the engineer's belt can be modified, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

recipes.name: Ultimate Gnomish Army Knife
recipes.description: Once you have an Ultimate Gnomish Army Knife in your possession, this recipe will create a version without jumper cables that you can sell to pathetic non-engineers.

recipes.name: Gearspring Parts
recipes.description:
Additional parts are created when your Engineering skill is 600 or higher.

May also create Sorcerous Fire and Air.

Cooldown resets daily.

recipes.name: Secrets of Draenor Engineering
recipes.description: Compile your knowledge of Engineering once per day.  Secrets can be traded for recipes.

recipes.name: Gearspring Parts
recipes.description: May also create Sorcerous Fire and Air.

recipes.name: Goblin Glider
recipes.description:
Permanently attaches a specialized folding assembly to a cloak, allowing you to deploy a goblin glider and fall slowly for 2 min.  The glider has some initial thrust and allows you to turn while falling.

The cloak can only be used once every three minutes and requires a Pandaria Engineering skill of at least 1 to operate.

recipes.name: Watergliding Jets
recipes.description: Permanently attaches waterjets to your belt, allowing you to walk on water and swim quickly for 12 sec.  (30 Sec Cooldown)

recipes.name: High-Explosive Gunpowder
recipes.description: Ghost iron can be shaved into tiny particles, giving it the ability to detonate explosively.

recipes.name: Jard's Peculiar Energy Source
recipes.description: Create a peculiar energy source from Ghost Iron Bars. This can only be done once a day.

recipes.name: Grounded Plasma Shield
recipes.description: Permanently attaches grounded plasma generators to your belt, allowing you to activate a powerful shield that absorbs damage.  (5 Min Cooldown)

recipes.name: Cardboard Assassin
recipes.description: Permanently attaches a tiny device to your belt, allowing you to create a Cardboard Assassin that enemies will attack.  (5 Min Cooldown)

recipes.name: Spinal Healing Injector
recipes.description:
Permanently attaches a specialized injector kit to your belt, allowing you to heal yourself for 1,947 every minute.  Shares a cooldown with potions.

Requires an Engineering skill of 450 or higher to operate.

recipes.name: Invisibility Field
recipes.description: Permanently attaches thousands of tiny mirrors to your belt, allowing you to attempt to turn invisible while out of combat.  (3 Min Cooldown)

recipes.name: EMP Generator
recipes.description: Permanently attaches a high-powered device to your belt, allowing you to confuse nearby mechanicals.  (1 Min Cooldown)

recipes.name: Flexweave Underlay
recipes.description:
Permanently attaches a flexweave underlay to a cloak, allowing you to turn the cloak into a parachute and fall slowly for 30 sec.

The cloak can only be used once a minute and requires a Northrend Engineering skill of at least 1.

recipes.name: Frag Belt
recipes.description:
Attach a miniaturized explosive assembly to your belt, allowing you to detach and throw a thermal grenade.  (1 Min Cooldown)

The thermal grenade inflicts 232 to 309 Fire damage and incapacitates targets for 3 sec in a 3 yard radius.

The thermal grenade has no effect on creatures above level 49.

recipes.name: Nitro Boosts
recipes.description:
Permanently attaches nitro boosts to your belt, allowing you to increase run speed for a few seconds.  Duration and speed may vary.  (2 Min Cooldown)

Nitro boosts share a cooldown with potions.

recipes.name: Mind Amplification Dish
recipes.description: Attaches a tiny mind amplification dish to your belt, allowing you to engage in mental battle with your enemies to hopefully control them.  (10 Min Cooldown)

recipes.name: Flying Machine
recipes.description: An amazing machine that allows the Engineer to fly.

recipes.name: Turbo-Charged Flying Machine
recipes.description: An amazing machine that allows the Engineer to fly.  This one is turbo charged.

recipes.name: Small Seaforium Charge
recipes.description: A Small Seaforium charge which is enough to blast open some doors.

recipes.name: Goblin Land Mine
recipes.description: Build a Goblin Land Mine.

recipes.name: The Mortar: Reloaded
recipes.description: Reloads an empty Goblin mortar.

recipes.name: Standard Scope
recipes.description: An improved scope that increases the damage done with your bow or gun.

recipes.name: Clockwork Box
recipes.description: A classic test of skill, the clockwork box provides the same skill gain potential when disassembled.

recipes.name: Dimensional Shifter
recipes.description: Permanently attaches a technomagical reality distorter device to your belt, allowing you to turn invisible while out of combat.

recipes.name: Electro-Jump
recipes.description: Permanently attaches a technomagical space-time folding device to your belt, allowing you to instantaneously teleport a short distance in a random direction.

recipes.name: Damage Retaliator
recipes.description: Permanently attach a technomagical magnetic flux array to your belt that, when activated, suspends several small bladed weapons around you, causing anyone who attacks to take damage.

recipes.name: Optical Target Embiggener
recipes.description: Create a permanent weapon enchantment usable only on Guns, Bows, or Crossbows.

recipes.name: Infra-green Reflex Sight
recipes.description: Create a permanent weapon enchantment usable only on Guns, Bows, or Crossbows.
